name: Duck Hater
description:
You are the last bird fighting against the ducks who are trying to destroy your cyrstal. Your wall only has 1000 health so try to defeat the ducks before they destroy your wall.

How to destroy them

1. Collect the seed source in your base

2. attack them with seeds

Types of seeds

1. Regular seed

2. Health Seed(Increases your health when you throw it at enemy and killing a  giga duck will spawn a health seed source for 10 seconds)

3. Fire Seed(Deals more damage when you throw it at enemy and killing a sniper/military duck will spawn a fire seed source for 5 seconds)

Types of Ducks

1. Regular duck

2. Giga duck - is giga and does a lot of damage(does 500 damage to wall)

3. dynamite duck - tries to explode the wall with mass explosives(does 300 damage to wall)

4. military duck -shoots you in air and on land
